price: Ati wanawafanya viumbe kuwa ni washirika wa Mwenyezi Mungu, nao hawaumbi, bali wao ndio wanaumbwa?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ
footnotes: Jee, inawafalia kumshirikisha Mwenyezi Mungu na masanamu yasio weza kuumba kitu, bali hayo yameumbwa na Mwenyezi Mungu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
